abstract: The delay comes as concerns mount about the safety of drugs in its class and provides a temporary reprieve to rival Amgen.
snippet: The delay comes as concerns mount about the safety of drugs in its class and provides a temporary reprieve to rival Amgen.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration has delayed approval of Roche’s new anemia drug, as concerns mount about the safety of drugs in its class.

headline.main: F.D.A. Is Delaying Approval of Anemia Drug From Roche
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Is Delaying Approval Of Anemia Drug From Roche
